title: Amazon VA - FBA Private Label A to Z - Product Research / Product Listing / Graphic
job_overview:
We are looking for a FEMALE Amazon Virtual Assistant
Position: Amazon VA - FBA Private Label A to Z - Product Researcher Product Listing / SEO / Graphic Designer
Full-time. Please do not apply if you are holding other jobs. Must complete 40 hours each week.
Remote (Work-from-home)

Requirements:
- Must have own working computer.
- Competent working devices with minimum internet speed at least 20 mbps.
- 40 Hours work each week.
- Good communication skills, Proficient in speaking and writing English.
- Strong research and analytical skills
- Familiarity with Amazon tools like Helium 10 / DataDive
- Familiarity with Photo and Video Editing tools like Canva, Photoshop, Filmora, Capcut etc.
- Willingness to learn and take on new tasks over time
- Must meet deadline 100% of time.
- Must perform well as a team.
- Must be resourceful.
- Detail-oriented and highly organized

What we provide:
1. Asia working hours
2. Work-from-home setup
3. National holidays off, paid
4. Bonus: 13th Month
5. Bonus: Year end
6. Long-term opportunity with career growth
7. Supportive and collaborative team

How to Apply:
If you are interested in this position and believe you have the qualities listed above to be successful, please submit your applications with the following in the correct order:
1. CV with your education and work experience in chronological order.
2. Attach your work portfolio such as: your past experiences.
Join our team and grow with us!
